original_text: While Jesus was still speaking, a crowd of people came towards him. Judas led the crowd to that place. He was one of the 12 apostles. He came near to Jesus to kiss him.
korean_text: 말씀하실 때에 한 무리가 오는데 열둘 중의 하나인 유다라 하는 자가 그들을 앞장서 와서

sentences.original_text: a crowd of people came towards him
Judas led the crowd to that place
He was one of the 12 apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 열두 사도 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: He came near to Jesus to kiss him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수께 다가와 입을 맞추려 하였다
